rows.label: qev030101_MSG0001
rows.name:
BLADE! Ransomer of my people!
You find me in my hour of need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0037
rows.name: I need your strength. Lend it to me again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0002
rows.name:
You saved many Tree clansmen.
But three are still prisoners.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0003
rows.name: Cavern Clan has them. They must be rescued now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0004
rows.name: We are not strong. We cannot best them in combat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0005
rows.name:
We beg Earth aliens to intervene.
It is our only hope. Kin die otherwise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_JNK0010
rows.name: Encourage[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_SEL0011
rows.name: Say Sevvy's clan will regain their strength in time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_JNK0020
rows.name: Reluctantly Agree[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_SEL0021
rows.name: Help Sevvy, but say they cannot rely on humans forever.

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0006
rows.name:
Your words are kind and true.
When clansmen return, we will not lose again![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0007
rows.name:
Correct. But not yet. Our numbers must grow.
Our clansmen must return.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0008
rows.name:
It is good you are helping. It puts me at ease.
I will give you names of those I seek.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0009
rows.name:
First is Oll Valdileo.
He was taken to Milligan supply base in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0010
rows.name:
Second is Rada Valdileo, younger brother of Oll.
He is also in supply base.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0011
rows.name:
Third is Uzoma Vassago.
...He is my son.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0012
rows.name:
He was rear guard when we fled. He let us escape.
Then he was made prisoner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0013
rows.name:
He is at Mesa Fortress. We hear things about
that place. Terrible things. You must help him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0014
rows.name:
Are locations clear? I can repeat them.
Who would you hear about?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_JNK0030
rows.name: Oll Valdileo[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Sevvy about Oll Valdileo's whereabouts.

rows.label: qev030101_JNK0040
rows.name: Rada Valdileo[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Sevvy about Rada Valdileo's whereabouts.

rows.label: qev030101_JNK0050
rows.name: Uzoma Vassago[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Sevvy about Uzoma Vassago's whereabouts.

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0015
rows.name:
Oll Valdileo is at Milligan supply base.
His brother Rada is also there. Help them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0016
rows.name: Rada Valdileo is at Milligan supply base.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0017
rows.name:
He is timid sort. Rare for Prone. But he has been
captive for long time and will likely be afraid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0018
rows.name: Uzoma is prisoner at Mesa Fortress. In Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0019
rows.name:
I know it is hard. But he is my son.
...Please bring him home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0020
rows.name:
My clansmen are safe!
You have done this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0021
rows.name:
As chieftain of Tree Clan,
I give you this award for bravery.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0022
rows.name:
My people were also brave. They withstood Cavern
Clan. They did not yield. This makes me proud.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0023
rows.name: Slaves of Ganglion try to trample us underfoot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0024
rows.name:
They cannot crush our spirit.
We are one with beasts and Great Tree.
We are true form of Prone![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0025
rows.name: You are same, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_JNK0060
rows.name: Agree[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_SEL0061
rows.name: Say that the Tree Clan's ways resonate with you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_JNK0070
rows.name: Deny[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_SEL0071
rows.name: Bluntly confess that you do not understand their ways.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0026
rows.name:
Indeed. You are family now. Fellow clansman.
We are at your side always.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0027
rows.name:
Nrgh... Such things take time. But I still like you.
We are at your side always.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0028
rows.name:
Now only Uzoma remains.
Rescue my son like you did others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0029
rows.name: ...Hmm? What is matter? Is Uzoma well?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_JNK0080
rows.name: Evade[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_SEL0081
rows.name: Offer a vague, hand-waving answer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_JNK0090
rows.name: Inform[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_SEL0091
rows.name: Report Uzoma's death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0030
rows.name: Then hurry to his aid! His life is in your hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0031
rows.name: ...What? Killed by Cavern Clan?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0032
rows.name:
...He refused to yield and died in belly of beast?
This is noble Prone death.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0033
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0034
rows.name:
No time to mourn. We will feed on his sacrifice and
grow stronger as clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0035
rows.name:
Soon we will destroy Cavern Clan.
Every man. Every woman. Every child.
None shall survive.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev030101_MSG0036
rows.name:
You have aided us. This is my thanks.
I hope you will aid us again.[ST:wait ]
